data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Mathias Pereira Lage scores to make it 1-0 at Stade Raymond Kopa.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a throw-in for Marseille, close to Angers's area.
Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 8, Marseille have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Angers in their own half.
Throw-in for Marseille close to the penalty box.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to Marseille.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
Angers's Angelo Fulgini breaks free at Stade Raymond Kopa. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 13, Ball goes out of play for a Marseille goal kick.
In Angers a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Marseille's Valentin Rongier has been booked in Angers.
In the minute 15, Angers to take a throw-in in Marseille territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in high up the field for Angers in Angers.
Free kick Angers.
Angers's Mathias Pereira Lage gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 18, Marseille have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Angers.
Throw-in for Marseille at Stade Raymond Kopa.
In the minute 22, Angers have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a Angers throw-in in Marseille's half.
In the minute 23, Can Angers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
Goal! Angers extend their lead to 2-0 through Lois Diony.
In Angers, Marseille push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Ball safe as Angers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Angers in the half of Marseille.
Can Angers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
Throw-in for Marseille in the half of Angers.
In the minute 30, Hakim Ben el Hadj awards the home team a throw-in.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Marseille.
Free kick for Marseille in the half of Angers.
In the minute 33, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Angers needs to be cautious. Marseille have an attacking throw-in.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 37, Marseille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Angers close to the penalty box.
In the minute 38, Hiroki Sakai for Marseille has been booked by Hakim Ben el Hadj and receives a first yellow card.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a Angers throw-in in Marseille's half.
In the minute 39, Angers's Angelo Fulgini misses with an attempt on goal.
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards Marseille a goal kick.
Goal kick for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
In the minute 42, Can Angers capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Marseille's half?
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards Angers a goal kick.
Marseille have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Marseille.
Duje Caleta Car (Marseille) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Angers have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Free kick Angers.
Hakim Ben el Hadj will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Stade Raymond Kopa.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
Andre Villas-Boas is making the team's first substitution at Stade Raymond Kopa with Saif-Eddine Khaoui replacing Hiroki Sakai.
Souleyman Doumbia (Angers) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in Angers.
Free kick for Marseille in the half of Angers.
In the minute 48, Angelo Fulgini is booked for the home team.
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards the away team a throw-in.
Angers to take a throw-in in Marseille territory.
In the minute 50, In Angers a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Angers have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
Ball goes out of play for a Marseille goal kick.
In the minute 52, Can Angers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
Throw-in for Marseille in their own half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Angers in their own half.
Angers advance rapidly upfield but Hakim Ben el Hadj blows for offside.
At Stade Raymond Kopa, Duje Caleta Car has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 56, Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Angers.
Marseille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Marseille.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Marseille in the half of Angers.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Angers.
Throw-in for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
In the minute 59, Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Florian Thauvin is on a sub for Mickael Cuisance for Marseille.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Andre Villas-Boas (Marseille) is making a third substitution, with Luis Henrique replacing Valere Germain.
Ball safe as Marseille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 64, Dimitri Payet for Marseille gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Angers.
Angers to take a throw-in in Marseille territory.
In the minute 66, Angers have a dangerous throw-in.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a Marseille throw-in in Angers's half.
Corner awarded to Marseille.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to Marseille.
Penalty! Hakim Ben el Hadj points to the spot, great chance for Marseille...
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards Marseille a penalty but Dimitri Payet misses from 12 yards.
In the minute 71, Marseille have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
Can Angers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
Throw-in for Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 73, Free kick in a good position for Angers!
Marseille will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Angers.
At Stade Raymond Kopa, Angers are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 74, Kevin Strootman is replacing Yuto Nagatomo for Marseille at Stade Raymond Kopa.
The away team replace Dario Benedetto with Marley Ake.
Throw-in for Marseille close to the penalty box.
In the minute 75, Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 2-1 through a header from Valentin Rongier.
That's a fine assist from Dimitri Payet.
Boubacar Kamara for Marseille drives towards goal at Stade Raymond Kopa. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 77, Corner awarded to Marseille.
Marseille surge into the attack at Stade Raymond Kopa but Florian Thauvinâ€™s header is off-target.
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards Angers a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Hakim Ben el Hadj awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Angers make their first substitution with Antonin Bobichon replacing Angelo Fulgini.
In the minute 79, Mohamed Ali Cho is replacing Lois Diony for the home team.
Angers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj waits before resuming play because Romain Thomas for Angers is still down.
In the minute 85, Angers make their third substitution with Mateo Pavlovic replacing Romain Thomas.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
Throw-in for Angers in the half of Marseille.
In the minute 87, Throw-in Marseille.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a throw-in for Angers, close to Marseille's area.
In the minute 88, Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Angers.
Saif-Eddine Khaoui (Marseille) has received a first yellow card.
Marseille have a goal kick.
Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
Marseille have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
Goal kick for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Angers to take a throw-in in Marseille territory.
At Stade Raymond Kopa the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Full-time! The final score is 2-1.
The home team replace Mathias Pereira Lage with Farid El Melali.
